title: Mount Guero
text: Mount Guero is a <a href="Topographic%20prominence">prominent</a> <a href="mountain">mountain</a> <a href="summit">summit</a> in the <a href="West%20Elk%20Mountains">West Elk Mountains</a> range of the <a href="Rocky%20Mountains">Rocky Mountains</a> of <a href="North%20America">North America</a>. The peak is located in the <a href="West%20Elk%20Wilderness">West Elk Wilderness</a> of the <a href="Gunnison%20National%20Forest">Gunnison National Forest</a>, east of <a href="Crawford%2C%20Colorado">Crawford, Colorado</a> in <a href="Delta%20County%2C%20Colorado">Delta County</a> and west-southwest (<a href="Absolute%20bearing">bearing</a> 245°) of the <a href="Crested%20Butte%2C%20Colorado">Town of Crested Butte</a> in <a href="Gunnison%20County%2C%20Colorado">Gunnison County</a>, <a href="Colorado">Colorado</a>, <a href="United%20States">United States</a>.
